Name: Ser Boltyn, Breaker of Dawn
Functional Text:
If you've **charged** this turn, your attacks get +1{p} while defended by an attack action card.

**Attack Reaction** - Banish a card from Boltyn's soul: Target attack with {p} greater than its base gets **go again**.

Name: Helm of Halo's Grace
Functional Text:
When this defends, you may **charge** your hero's soul. If a yellow card is **charged** this way, draw a card.

**Blade Break**

Name: Solar Plexus
Functional Text: **Instant** - Destroy this, banish a card from your soul: Yellow cards cost you {r} less to play this turn.

Name: Bracers of Bellona's Grace
Functional Text:
When this defends, you may **charge** your hero's soul. If a yellow card is **charged** this way, create a Courage token.

**Blade Break**

Name: Warpath of Winged Grace
Functional Text:
When this defends, you may **charge** your hero's soul. If a yellow card is **charged** this way, create a Quicken token.

**Blade Break**

Name: Saving Grace
Functional Text:
As an additional cost to play this, you may **charge** your hero's soul.

If you've **charged** this turn, target attack gets -2{p}.
